snippet.title: Dreamscaper 1.0 Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Out of Early Access August 5th (note the revised date!) on Steam, Switch and Epic Games Store.

Wishlist now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1040420/Dreamscaper/

By night, delve deep into your subconscious and discover powerful artifacts to conquer your nightmares. By day, explore the city of Red Haven and build relationships to unlock the power of your dreams.

DREAM. DIE. WAKE. REPEAT.

FOLLOW:
https://twitter.com/DreamscaperGame

HANG OUT:
https://discord.gg/dreamscaper
